sentences.sContent: I think we were fooled by penicillin.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think we were fooled by penicillin.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得我们都被青霉素愚弄了。

sentences.sContent: I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin.
sentences.sContent_eng: I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin.
sentences.sCn: 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的。

sentences.sContent: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.sCn: 这确实加快了青霉素作为抗生素的发展。

trans.tranOther: a type of medicine that is used to treat infections caused by  bacteria
